data.text: Loved everything about this hotel. The location is perfect, staff was friendly and welcoming and the room was modern and comfortable and clean. Everything was great and we’ll be back for sure when we come back to Barcelona. Loved the atmosphere and design of the hotel and room.
data.title: Perfect stay in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Assaf,
We are happy to know that you liked our commitment to a hotel with a casual and functional design designed to offer you the greatest possible comfort in a place as privileged as the center of Barcelona and without giving up the tranquility of our rooms and that you share it. with the rest of the travelers.
But above all we thank you for your words towards our staff who are our reward, clients like you give meaning to our work. Thank you.
The entire Pau team thanks you for your comment and we look forward to a next visit to enjoy your company again. We are waiting for you!!!
Best regards
Juan Mi. Lopez
Front desk
owner_response.author: room mate PAU

data.text: Excellent location in an easy walking distance to La Rambla, Placa de Catalunya, and heaps of cafés,  bakeries, and restaurants. Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. A special thanks to the wonderful staff in the breakfast room. They created brilliant breakfasts, and their warm welcome and smiles were always a great way to start the day.
data.title: New Favourite Hotel in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Igor,
We thank you for highlighting our privileged location, right in the center of Barcelona with the entire city and what it offers within reach and above all for your mention of our staff, especially the breakfast staff who put so much effort into surprising you. and satisfy you so that you start the day with renewed energy.
The entire Pau team thanks you for your assessment and for sharing it with the rest of the travelers and we hope to see you again with us where we will make you feel at home. We are waiting for you!!!
Best regards
Juan Mi. Lopez
Front desk
owner_response.author: room mate PAU

data.text:
Me and my 11 year old daughter had a wonderful experience in the hotel. 
All of the staff is great classe, from the charming helpful receptionist Leandro to the friendly peruviuan waiter at the breakfast table to the smiling cleaning lady! Location is top, in the heart of Barcelona, easily connected to redt of the city. 
I would definitly come back!
data.title: wonderful citytrip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Odet, 
A very big thank you to you for finding precious time to write this most amazing review. Also i would like to thank you for choosing Room Mate Pau. 
Here we always try to reflect the positivity of our customers.
We are looking forward to see you and your daughter again.
Leandro
owner_response.author: room mate PAU

data.text:
I booked Room Mate Pau as it was very central for meeting up with friends.I had requested a quiet room and was pleased that this was available.The room was very clean,with a large,comfortable bed with great choice of pillows.Bathroom with shower was quite spacious,I LOVED the hairdryer,very light and easy to use which was a bonus.
Staff were very friendly and helpful.The breakfast room was very bright and airy and led on to the terrace.Great choices of food at breakfast and I did not feel rushed.
As a solo traveller I felt very safe in this hotel.I will definetly recommend to friends and family and will return one day :) 
PS What company makes the hairdryers?
data.title: Great central hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Gregory,
	We are more than delighted, thank you very much for finding very precious time to write this most amazing and detailed review. It means a lot or us to know that you had an amazing time at Room Mate Pau. 
As for the hairdryers, they are made by an italian company called "ID Italian Design"
	
On behalf of all our staff i would like to say thank you and welcome to the Room Mate family.
	
We will be more than happy if you will  have the opportunity to visit us again.
	
Truly yours, 
Cristina
owner_response.author: room mate PAU

data.text: The location of this hotel is very perfect. You can travel comfortably to any tourist attraction. Friendly staff and clean room condition. The bedding was very comfortable, and there was no noise, so I could sleep deeply.  I would recommend it in every way.
data.title: a perfect hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear customer, 
Thank you for writing this review, we are so happy that you had a good night sleep on our new mattress. Reading reviews like yours always makes us wanna improve more and more.
I hope we will have the opportunity to see you again.
My very best regards.
Sergiu
owner_response.author: room mate PAU
